officialTitle: A Study in Renal Predialysis and Dialysis Patients of the Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of Recombinant Hepatitis B Vaccine Manufactured With a Modified Process

interventions.name: Comparator: modified process hepatitis B vaccine

summary: To describe the immunogenicity and safety of modified process hepatitis B vaccine administered to renal predialysis and dialysis patients

primaryOutcome.measure: The Number of Seroprotected Participants to the Modified Process Hepatitis B Vaccine and ENGERIX-B™ (Currently Licensed Vaccine) at Month 7
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 7 months (1 month after the third dose)
